question: Gog and Magog (Yajuj and Majuj). Will they destroy western powers?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Upon the release of Yajuj and Majuj, they will wipe out most of mankind. We
are not aware of any hadith that deals with the actual details of defeating
the western powers.

It is true that it will take seven years to dispose of the weapons of Yajuj
and Majuj.

Was salaam

Mufti E Desai
